titles.title: Affordable Homeowners Insurance Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt disaster relief distributions from retirement plans from the penalty for early withdrawal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/26/2007--Introduced.
Affordable Homeowners Insurance Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt distributions from retirement plans for disaster relief from the penalty for premature retirement plan withdrawals.
